root.name: 18 Wheels of Steel: Extreme Trucker
root.description: Overview18 Wheels of Steel: Extreme Trucker is a driving game developed by SCS Software and published by ValuSoft for the PC.System RequirementsOS: Windows速 XP/VistaProcessor: Pentium速 4 1.4 GHz or betterMemory: 256 MB RAMGraphics: 64 MB AGP DirectX速 9 and TL compatible video accelerator cardDirectX速: DirectX 9.0cHard Drive: 540 MB of free spaceSound: DirectX compatible sound card
